result.html: Fíor nó bréagachTrue or false?
result.ponchtml: Fíor nó bréagaċTrue or false?

result.eng: These aren't friends, they're false friends.
result.ga: Ní cairde iad seo ach bréagchairde
result.orig: Ní cairde iad seo ach bréagchairde

result.ponchtml: Ní cairde iad seo aċ bréagċairdeThese aren't friends, they're false friends.

result.eng: Five spies were based around the country under false names.
result.ga: Bhí cúigear spiairí lonnaithe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneacha bréige
result.orig: Bhí cúigear spiairí lonnaithe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneacha bréige

result.ponchtml: Ḃí cúigear spiairí lonnaiṫe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneaċa bréigeFive spies were based around the country under false names.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
